mapper.select: SELECT * FROM novel_section_tb as ns LEFT JOIN ( select * from user_novel_record_tb where user_id = #{userId} ) as unr ON ns.id = unr.section_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT section_id, avg(score) AS score FROM score_tb GROUP BY section_id ) AS s ON ns.id = s.section_id WHERE ns.novel_id = #{novelId} order by ns.id DESC

SELECT unr.user_id,unr.novel_id,unr.section_id,ns.title,ns.content FROM user_novel_record_tb as unr LEFT JOIN novel_section_tb as ns ON unr.section_id = ns.id WHERE unr.user_id = #{userId} order by unr.created_at DESC LIMIT 1;
